# 开源 PHP 开发框架 Yii 全方位教程

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng
kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng
kaiyuan-php-kaifa-kuangjia-yii-quanfangwei-jiaocheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
